dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5387 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 14373 Manchester Road in St. Louis, Missouri, as the “Sgt. Zachary M. Fisher Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Wagner (for herself, Mr. Clay, Mr. Luetkemeyer, Mrs. Hartzler, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Graves of Missouri, Mr. Long, and Mr. Smith of Missouri) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 14373 Manchester Road in St. Louis, Missouri, as the Sgt. Zachary M. Fisher Post Office.

section.header: Sgt. Zachary M. Fisher Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 14373 Manchester Road in St. Louis, Missouri, shall be known and designated as the Sgt. Zachary M. Fisher Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sgt. Zachary M. Fisher Post Office.
